title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: The original chart instance in the report design handle should be modified after running the report.
EB: In my application, I obtain the design time instance of the chart and then call a method that runs the report. I expect the chart to be bound with data after running the report. However, the original chart instance in the report design handle remains unchanged. This functionality was working correctly until BIRT 2.0M3.
SR: Fix the issue where the original chart instance in the report design handle is not modified after running the report.
